name: Arcane Rivals
description:
Arcane Rivals is a fast-paced platformer inspired by classic sidescrollers. Become the greatest witch in the land by navigating the three arcane realms and facing off against magical adversaries, each with their own unique fighting style. When you defeat an opponent, you steal their spells, unlocking new abilities and ways to play.

Made in 2 weeks for the GMS2 BetaJam 2.
